attributes.action: make cyclists take the same responsibilities as motorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We demand that cyclists bear the same responsibility as other road users

1) They pay road tax at a rate of 15 pounds per 6 months or 25 pounds per year to in aid in the construction of cycle lanes.

2) They pay a fee of 10 pounds per year for the cost of an MOT to ensure that their cycles are roadworthy and safe for themselves and other road users.

3) They carry third party insurance to cover the costs for any incidents they have been judged by either the police or a court of law to have caused, the same as any other road user.

We believe and accept that cyclists are welcome to use the roads network, However we firmly believe that they must bear the same responsibilities and share the costs involved as other road users must.
